extendedInfo.description: 'About Delhi' is a high-end offline/online tour guide Android Application.It is a complete virtual tour guide to the magnanimous Indian metropolis. Get detailed information about the weather, metro, must visit spots, hotels, nightlight, restaurants, emergency and lingo help. Enjoy the wonder and admire the beauty of the city by knowing the city well, offering every detail without the internet. Only, Weather and Lingo Help sections require internet connectivity. Known for its rich cultural heritage and architectural splendor, do not miss to visit places mentioned in the app's 'Must Visit' section. It comes bundled with a host of features as below:Weather: Get the most recent weather updates before you step out to explore the city. Metro: Travel through the Metro and reach your destinations on time. Check the available Routes, Schedules and Metro Stations offline, now with accurate detailed train timings. Must Visit: Visit hot-spots like the Red Fort, Qutub Minar, Chandni Chowk, Lodi Gardens, India Gate, Humayun's Tomb, Garden of Five Senses, Jama Masjid, Gandhi Smriti, Akshardham Temple, and Jantar Mantar. These are the iconic places Delhi is famous for. Get detailed information about the place with a snapshot, address and Google Locations.Nightlife: Experience the of the city in some of the most top notch places such as Machan - The Taj Mahal Hotel, Oro The Bar - Radisson Blu, Kafe Fontana - Taj Palace Hotel, Onyx Bar - The Royal Plaza, The Blue Bar - Taj Palace Hotel, Threesixty Degrees - The Oberoi, and others. Hotels: Book your stay at one of the most luxurious hotels in Delhi for a lavish experience. Email or contact for a hotel reservation from the information provided in the app. Check the ratings, amenities, location, cuisine served at the hotel, all in a few clicks. Emergency: Get quick emergency help in Delhi. Be it Medical, Transport and/or Crime help anywhere anytime, find all numbers installed within the application. Lingo Help: Internet is required to use this section. The default translation is to English language, which eases communication at large. About Delhi is a feature-rich iPhone application. It is a collection of information about the most exotic and best places in Delhi.Go ahead and download the app now!Note: All information is indicative to help the user best navigate through the Delhi and is taken from various web sites. No content of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch- Though the Design and presentation of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch Technologies Ltd,. India.For any support queries, please feel free to write to us at mobileproducts@silvertouch.comâ Please visit our City Guide Apps website - http://www.silvertouch.mobi/cityguide- For Complete mobile application portfolio can be viewing from this website -- http://www.silvertouch.mobi
